title: 53.5mm Espresso Tamper | Fits 54mm IMS Baskets, Gaggia Classic Pro, 54mm VST Filter Baskets | Made in Italy | Walnut and INOX Steel Metal Tamper, Flat Bottom.
features: THE FLAVOR IS THE STORY - Taste the rich aroma of a smooth tamped espresso. Real tools designed with pride and care will prepare you to embark on a journey to an authentic taste of Italy.

THE TOOL YOU'VE BEEN WAITING FOR - Designed with passion and precision. Genuine imported Italian crafted classic tamper that's composed of high quality, long-lasting materials. Ensure yourself the confidence to create the perfect blend every time.

EASY TO USE AND CLEAN - The contoured handle, balanced weight, and even distribution allow you to easily and comfortably apply the right amount of pressure to achieve consistent, perfectly-pulled shots

FITS 54 MM FILTER BASKETS - Designed to work with compatible sized portafilters and espresso machine models including: Breville, Rancilio, Gaggia, IMS, VST and other precision portafilter baskets. Please measure your coffee filter to ensure a perfect fit!
We believe in the quality of our products and include a 1 year warranty from date of purchase.
description: Ergonomic walnut handle , stainless steel metal tamper, espresso essentials that are Ideal for a constant press with perfect balance. Specially designed for IMS COMPETITION and E&B Lab Precision Filter Baskets. Fits with many others such as Gaggia Classic Pro, VST baskets.
